## UI ### ‚ú® New Components/Features (available in production releases in 1-2 weeks) - `amp-lightbox-gallery:` Displays a lightbox gallery. It is launched üéâ and out of experiment mode. [Documentation](https://www.ampproject.org/docs/reference/components/amp-lightbox-gallery), [Sample](https://ampbyexample.com/components/amp-lightbox-gallery/)
- `amp-3d-gltf`: Displays 3D models that are in gITF format. (Contribution by @mixtur) [Documentation](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/extensions/amp-3d-gltf/amp-3d-gltf.md), [Sample](http://amphtml-nightly.herokuapp.com/examples/amp-3d-gltf.amp.html)
- `amp-fx-collection="fade-in"` and `amp-fx="fade-in-scroll":` Allows for easy-to-use fade-in effects on any element. They are fully launched and out of experiment. [Documentation](https://www.ampproject.org/docs/reference/components/amp-fx-collection), [Sample](https://ampbyexample.com/components/amp-fx-collection/)
- `amp-bodymoving-animation:` Now supports scrollbound animations (Thanks @jessepinho) [Sample](https://codepen.io/aghassemi/pen/jxvzzq)
- `input type=file` is available for use now. It is restricted to `POST` forms. [Documentation](https://www.ampproject.org/docs/reference/components/amp-form#inputs-and-fields) - `rotate-to-fullscreen:` Allows rotation of the phone to take a video to fullscreen. It is now supported on `amp-ima-video` in addition to `amp-video` [Documentation](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/spec/amp-video-interface.md#rotate-to-fullscreen), [Sample](https://ampbyexample.com/advanced/video_rotate_to_fullscreen_with_hint/) - `amp-accordion animate:` The new `animate` attribute on `amp-accordion` allows expand/collapse actions to animate the height of the section. - `amp-facebook:` Now supports `data-order-by` attribute. ### üê£ New Experimental Features - `amp-next-page` now available as a [doc-level optin](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/3a06c99f259b66998b61935a5ee5f0075481bfd2/tools/experiments/README.md#enable-an-experiment-for-a-particular-document). [Documentation](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/106bafa2be210a33b0389e13a7245e6aa2d40351/extensions/amp-next-page/amp-next-page.md) - `amp-fx-collection="fly-in"` experimentally available under flag `amp-fx-fly-in` [Documentation](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/106bafa2be210a33b0389e13a7245e6aa2d40351/extensions/amp-fx-collection/amp-fx-collection.md#fly-in-bottom-fly-in-left-fly-in-right-fly-in-top-experimental) ### üêõ Bug Fixes - `amp-lightbox-gallery:` Now does not show nav or gallery controls if there is only one item. #15475 - `amp-twitter`: Now resizes to placeholder/fallback when tweet is deleted/unavailable #15542 - `amp-reddit`: Now resizes dynamically when needed #15530 - `amp-date-picker:` Dropshadow no longer cut off https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/pull/15412 - `validator`: `gulp validator --update_tests` now works to update validator test output. ### What's next? - `general maintenance:` is the focus for short term. - `amp-video-iframe:` https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/issues/8524: New component that allows implementation of `video-interface` by arbitrary iframed players so they can get the benefits such as autoplay, docking, etc... - `infinite scroll:` for `amp-list` https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/issues/14060: New feature on `amp-list` that allows for `load-more` and `infinite scroll` use-cases. - `input-masking`: https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/issues/14745 Allows for automatically inserting expected characters and spaces in a given form input. - `amp-content-viewer:` #13602: New component to allow zoom/pan for SVGs and potentially other elements.
- `amp-video dock`: Ability to dock to a particular placeholder.
